concordance.translation[0].definitions[0: an alphabetical list of all the words used in a book or set of books, with information about where they can be found and usually about how they are used
concordance.translation[0].definitions[1: a list of all the words in a book, magazine etc, held on a computer database, showing every example of a particular word in the book etc
concordance.translation[0].definitions[2: the state of being similar to something else or in agreement with it
